knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(GEOquery)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
GSE99287 <- getGEO(GEO = "GSE99287")
```

```{r}
GSE99287[[1]] %>% pData()
```

```{r}
GSE135092 <- getGEO(GEO = "GSE135092")
```

```{r}
GSE135092[[1]] %>% pData() %>% 
    filter(`tissue:ch1` == c("RPE, Macula")) %>% 
    pull(`amd_status:ch1`) %>% table()
```
